document_data.caption: Cover of [[Polyhedron (German) Magazine 1|Polyhedron (German) #1]] from 1999
document_data.title: Polyhedron (German)
document_data.mainbody: '''''Polyhedron (German)''''' was an official publication of the [[Role Playing Game Association]] (RPGA) in Germany.
document_data.History: The magazine was published irregularly from 1999 to 2000, approximately every six months. A number of articles were translations of other magazines' articles, including [[The Everwinking Eye]] by [[Ed Greenwood]], with others being original.
